content.description: The content to be displayed in the badge

max.description: Caps the value of badge content

size.description:
Sets the size of the badge with the values:
small | large

hideBadge.description: Controls the visibility of the badge

verticalAlignment.description: Aligns the badge vertically in the wrapped element with values: top | bottom

horizontalAlignment.description: Aligns the badge horizontally in the wrapped element with values: left | right

showZero.description: Shows the badge when content is zero
